articles.content:
Korean people's cause of reunification supported
   Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Alpha Oumar Konare, President of the Republic of Mali, met the DPRK delegation led by vice-president Yang Hyong Sop of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on June 8.Referring to the friendly relations between Korea and Mali based on the deep relations of intimacy forged between the President Kim Il Sung and the first president Modivo Keita, he said the relations are now being carried forward successfully by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is identical with the President Kim Il Sung.   He expressed full support to the struggle of the Korean people for the country's reunification and hoped relations between the two countries would further develop.
